properties.entry: SELECT id, accno, title, secretKey, relPath, rTime, cTime, mTime, rootSection_id, owner_id from Submission WHERE version != -1 and cTime > :sync_time
SELECT id, accno, title, secretKey, relPath, rTime, cTime, mTime, rootSection_id, owner_id from Submission WHERE version != -1
SELECT id, accno, title, secretKey, relPath, rTime, cTime, mTime, rootSection_id, owner_id from Submission WHERE version != -1 and id = :submissionId
select name, value, valueQualifierString, reference from FileAttribute where file_id = :file_id
select name, value, valueQualifierString, reference from LinkAttribute where link_id = :link_id
select id, url from Link where section_id = :section_id
select name, value, valueQualifierString, reference from SectionAttribute where section_id = :section_id
select id, name, size from FileRef where sectionId = :section_id
select id, accno, type from Section where parent_id = :section_id
select id, accno, type from Section where id = :section_id
select at.name from Submission_AccessTag sat, AccessTag at where sat.Submission_id = :submissionId and sat.accessTags_id = at.id
select id, name, value, valueQualifierString, reference from SubmissionAttribute where submission_id = :submissionId
select email from User where id = :user_id
